Detailed Description

Definition at line 103 of file apsmeSwitchKey.h.

Field Documentation

ExtAddr_t APS_SwitchKeyInd_t::srcAddress

[LE] The extended 64-bit address of the device that sent the switch-key command.

Definition at line 107 of file apsmeSwitchKey.h.

NWK_KeySeqNum_t APS_SwitchKeyInd_t::keySeqNumber

A sequence number assigned to a network key by the Trust Center and used to distinguish network keys.
